address.Common.Line1: Hwy 17 N at Carolina Park Blvd

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Hwy 17 N at Carolina Park Blvd

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line1: Hwy 17 N at Carolina Park Blvd

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Hwy 17 N at Carolina Park Blvd

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This 1.462 acre site is located just one lot off Hwy 17 N on Carolina Park Blvd which is the main entrance to Carolina Park and Wando High School. The site is zoned commercial within the Carolina Park PUD and i deed restricted to be developed as office type uses. Carolina Park is a 1,700 acre master planned community including recreation, shopping, educational, single family residential, multi-family residential and commercial uses, The newest retailer is Costco. The site next door to this site is 2.78 acres and is for sale so that a buyer could combine the two sites to obtain a total of 4.242 acres.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: This 1.462 acre site is located just one lot off Hwy 17 N on Carolina Park Blvd

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Easy access to Bluffton, USC-New River Campus, Interstate 95, Hilton Head/Savannah International Airport as well as Hilton Head Island, Savannah, Beaufort and surrounding areas.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1.31 Acres at main entrance  into Carolina Park and Wando High School.  Site is zoned commercial within Carolina Park PUD and is deed restricted to be developed as bank or office type uses.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Carolina Park at Hwy 17 North.  1.31 Acres

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Land is located on North Highway 17 in Mt. Pleasant. It is 1.2 miles just past the intersection with Highway 41. The property is on the left hand side across from the Lowe’s Home Improvement.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to present 11.48 acres of land in the heart of Mt. Pleasant. One of a few undeveloped tracts of commercial land located along Highway 17 North, this site contains a total of 11.48 acres in 6 parcels with excellent visibility on Highway 17 North in the heart of Mount Pleasant. The parcels include TMS Numbers 598-00-00 lots 008, 025, 020, 059, 018 and 012. 
The site is zoned areawide business in the Town of Mt. Pleasant. The height limit is 35 feet. The site is located across from the new Lowe’s Home Improvement Center, easily accessible to Highway 41 and Park West. 
This large land area for development has access to both sides of Highway 17 North. Mostly flat, not in a flood zone, and minimal wetlands.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Exceptional proximity to the Isle of Palms, the Old Village of Mt. Pleasant, and Shem Creek. 
The area consists of primarily commercial development along Coleman Boulevard, with residential development running from Coleman into the harbor along the marshes of the Intra Coastal Waterway. Coleman Boulevard has traditionally been viewed as the “Main Street” of Mount Pleasant. 
The surrounding area is high-end residential and retail, with several of the more affluent residential neighborhoods in greater Charleston within a mile of the Property.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The site consists of 3 adjacent tax parcels that total 3.99 acres (173,804 SF) of land. The property is located at Ben Sawyer Boulevard at Center Street in Mt. Pleasant, South Carolina just across the Intra Coastal Waterway from Sullivan’s Island. It sits on a lighted corner location at Center Street with excellent visibility and access. Over 520’ of frontage on Ben Sawyer Blvd and over 250’ on Center Street.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 3.99 acres for sale at Center Street in Mt. Pleasant, SC | 1460-1470 Ben Sawyer Blvd

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 512 Johnnie Dodds Blvd is the Miller Cadillac site of 4.56 Acres located at the intersection of Johnnie Dodds Blvd and Mathis Ferry Road.  The site is zoned Area Wide Business 2 in the Town of Mt. Pleasant.   The site can be developed as hotel, office, retail, restaurant, assisted living and other commercial uses.  The height limit is 80 feet.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 4.56 Acres located at the intersection of Johnnie Dodds Blvd and Mathis Ferry Road.
